Package org.neo4j.util

Class Preconditions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.util.Preconditions
  • public final class Preconditions
extends Object
    A set of static convenience methods for checking ctor/method parameters or state.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor Description
      private Preconditions()

      • requirePositive

        public static long requirePositive​(long value)
        Ensures that value is greater than or equal to 1 or throws IllegalArgumentException otherwise.
        Parameters:
        value - a value for check
        Returns:
        value if it's greater than or equal to 1
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if value is less than 1
